span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-family: Arial;
font-family: Arial; font-size: medium;
font-size: medium; font-family: "Open Sans", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

br.span: To find an Xfinity WiFi Hotspot, check the hotspot location map at

span.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: medium;

a.style: color: rgb(4, 116, 232); text-decoration-line: none; box-sizing: border-box; cursor: pointer; font-weight: 900; font-family: "Open Sans", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

span.style: font-family: "Open Sans", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

span.span: or download the Xfinity WiFi Hotspots app from the App Store or Google Play.

span.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: medium;

br.span: Once at a hotspot, select “xfinitywifi” network name from the wifi menu, then launch the preferred browser. No data caps!

strong.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

span.style: font-family: Arial;
font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-family: Arial;
font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

span.span: The program is now offering FREE internet for the next two months. As we are moving to remote learning, this is a great resource. The number to apply is 855-846-8376 or you can apply online at

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);
font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(7, 55, 99);
font-family: Arial;

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);

p.span: Effective Monday, March 16, 2020, anyone who signs up for Internet Essentials will receive two free months of Internet service. We are also increasing the speed of the program to 25 Mbps downloads, and 3 Mbps uploads for all new and existing customers.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);

p.span: After your first two free months expire, you can either cancel the service (which you can do at any time) or keep it as a regular paying Internet Essentials customer. You will receive an easy to use self-install-kit that includes a cable modem (to receive service at your home) with a WiFi router (to connect your devices without wires). There is no term contract or credit check and no shipping fee for equipment.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Charter will offer free Spectrum broadband and Wi-Fi access for 60 days to households with K-12 and/or college students who do not already have a Spectrum broadband subscription and at any service level up to 100 Mbps. To enroll call 1-844-488-8395.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Internet modem included. Add in-home WiFi for $5 a month.

span.style: font-size: 13.5pt; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Installation fees will be waived for new student households.

span.style: font-size: 16px;
font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;
font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;
font-family: "Open Sans", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;

br.span: To find an Xfinity WiFi Hotspot, check the hotspot location map at

span.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;

a.style: color: rgb(4, 116, 232); text-decoration-line: none; box-sizing: border-box; cursor: pointer; font-weight: 900; font-family: "Open Sans", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

span.style: font-family: "Open Sans", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

span.span: or download the Xfinity WiFi Hotspots app from the App Store or Google Play.

span.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;

br.span: Once at a hotspot, select “xfinitywifi” network name from the wifi menu, then launch the preferred browser. No data caps!

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Comfortaa, cursive; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;

span.style: font-family: Arial;

p.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Comfortaa, cursive; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

span.style: font-family: Arial;

a.style: white-space: pre; background-color: transparent; font-size: 12pt; text-decoration-line: none;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);
white-space: pre;
white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent; font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
background-color: transparent; font-size: 12pt;
background-color: transparent; font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre-wrap;

br.span: One-time cost of $99.99 for the hotspot. Human-i-t provides assistance with the sign-up process for this offer. A household needs to be 200% or below of the federal poverty level or be currently enrolled in an income-based government assistance program. Examples of programs include: food support (SNAP), financial assistance (TANF), free or reduced lunch at school, Section 8 voucher, Medicaid, and SSI. Customers must show proof of eligibility.
